member.name: ThumbnailStreamCacheOptions
member.summary: Defines the cache options used by the interface.

member.name: ThumbnailStreamCacheOptions.ExtractIfNotCached
member.summary: Return the cached thumbnail if it is already cached, otherwise extract the thumbnail to the cache.

member.name: ThumbnailStreamCacheOptions.ReturnOnlyIfCached
member.summary: Return the thumbnail only if it is already cached.

member.name: ThumbnailStreamCacheOptions.ResizeThumbnail
member.summary: Resize the thumbnail to match the requested size.

member.name: ThumbnailStreamCacheOptions.AllowSmallerSize
member.summary: Can return a cached thumbnail that is smaller than the requested size.
